channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside no 107, 9th July
item.description:
The manhole cover makes a loud noise everytime someone stands on it. Given the amount of footfall in the area, particularly at night from people returning from Primrose Hill to the tube, it's creating a real disturbance to locals
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 99, Regent's Park Road, Chalk Farm, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Full commercial bin, 9th July
item.description:
Approximately yesterday at 17:12 man with bawl head dress in full black passed me on the paved area at Elmer house with a full commercial waste bin. I was puzzled as to why he was going up hill with a full bin, I stopped and watch him crossed the road and went to the bin area at the end of the park opposite Elmer 1-25 .He empty the entire black metal bin with more than 15 bags into the park bin. I'm not sure if this is allowed. I suggest the council investigation and install CCTV to catch the person doing this act. He push the bin back to the external area opposite the supermarket attach in the photo. I strongly believe the refuse was from the supermarket. thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55-56, Penfold Street, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree planters have never, ever been maintained., 9th July
item.description:
There are several trees leading to the Elizabeth line entrance which have weeds up to 3ft high growing around them. Some of the new paving edgings have also collapsed. I don't recall the planters ever being maintained. I pass by to and from work every day. It's an absolute mess. Seems forgotten since the station opened.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 146-148, Felixstowe Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On the traffic junction of A5202 ST PANCRAS WAY - AGAR GROVE - RANDOLPH STREET, 9th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Randolph Street, Kentish Town, London

item.title: Right filter is not facing oncoming traffic, 9th July
item.description:
